FirstTimeaftertutorial.Text: Let’s take a look at the materials we have gathered from our expedition!
We can use these materials to craft some new spells. Let’s try it out!

Aftersuccessfullycrafting.Text: Crafting new spells allow you to unlock more spells to use on your adventures!
These will help you overcome the obstacles that you may encounter!
Remember different types of equipment require different materials.
Try to abstract the materials that you think are not related to the gear you are crafting.
That way you can focus on a smaller pool of materials to choose from when you are crafting!
I think we’re done here. Let’s take a look at where we could go next.
Head to the level select screen once you are ready.
